branchCategory.name: Precision Slide Table - MXQ/MXS
branchCategory.description: <p>The MXQ is the newest generation of precision slide tables integrated with hardened stainless steel guides and rails to isolate the load bearing from the movement of the dual rods and piston seals. The MXS is a precision slide table integrated with guides and rails combined with cross roller bearings to isolate the load bearing from the movement of the dual rods and piston seals.</p>

branchItem.name: Precision Slide Table with Recirculating Bearings - MXQ
branchItem.description: <p>The MXQ precision slide is ideal for applications requiring closely held parallelism and perpendicular specifications.</p>

branchItem.name: Precision Slide Table with Cross Roller Bearings - MXS
